description.originalText:
Bel is, in one word, INCREDIBLE! She has helped us care for our two children, ages 2 and 6, since March 2022, including most of the summer of 2022.

Bel is organized, punctual, respectful, kind, and highly engaged. She also communicates well about her schedule and any expectations around future scheduling. She has early childhood experience and training, and it shows in how she works with, plays with, and guides the girls. She has endless patience, and is creative and enthusiastic. It's clear to me that Bel loves what she does, and the girls love spending time with her.

In addition to nannying, Bel has also tutored the 6-year-old in math and reading. She has also helped the 2-year-old to learn the alphabet and many songs.

Bel feels like a member of our family and we have been the beneficiaries of the invaluable work ethic and spirit that she has. I highly recommend Bel to any family who is seeking a professional, nurturing, and highly engaged nanny.

description.displayText:
We hired Beltha(we call her Ms. Bel) a year ago. 
We enthusiastically recommend her, as a babysitter. She started with us in the middle of the pandemic. She became our greatest asset in helping with our daughters hybrid learning, Monday thru Friday. Once our daughter went back to full time in person school, Ms. Bel continues to work with us, with after school pickup. 
She consistently arrived at our home and for school pickup, on time, ready to engage with our daughter, with a smile on. She's kind, compassionate, intelligent, and the most patient. Ms. Bel also tutors my daughter in reading and math. And she always has activities planned, from baking, to dancing, and crafts. Our daughter looks forward to spending time with Ms. Bel and constantly talks about Ms. Bel when she's not with us.

description.displayText: A caring sitter for my 2 year old.  Started her day, changed, fed and keep her company. Would recommend for any family needing a sitter.
